/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the greenery along the street.
